item.title: A simple 2D Ball using Three.js
item.description: In today’s journal, I created a simple 2D ball using Three.js as an introduction for myself in using this Javascript library. Coming from p5.js, it is undeniable that there are a lot of good tutorials on how to use it. However, this time I would like to use Three.js for creative coding as an exploration and out of my curiosity. Three.js is known for its reputation as a 3D graphics library using WebGL.
